verses.verse: Sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%> in the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O you righteous <S%H6662><s%> ones; <S%H6662><s%> Praise <S%H8416><s%> is becoming <S%H5000><s%> to the upright. <S%H3477><s%>

Give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with the lyre; <S%H3658><s%> Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to Him with a harp <S%H5035><s%> of ten <S%H6218><s%> strings. <S%H6218><s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> to Him a new <S%H2319><s%> song; <S%H7892><s%> Play <S%H5059><s%> skillfully <S%H3190><s%> with a shout <S%H8643><s%> of joy. <S%H8643><s%>
For the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is upright; <S%H3477><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> His work <S%H4639><s%> is [done] in faithfulness. <S%H530><s%>
He loves <S%H157><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and justice; <S%H4941><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of the lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

By the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> were made, <S%H6213><s%> And by the breath <S%H7307><s%> of His mouth <S%H6310><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their host. <S%H6635><s%>
He gathers <S%H3664><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> together as a heap; <S%H5067><s%> He lays <S%H5414><s%> up the deeps <S%H8415><s%> in storehouses. <S%H214><s%>

Let all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Let all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> stand <S%H9076><s%> in awe <S%H9076><s%> of Him.
For He spoke, <S%H559><s%> and it was done; <S%H1961><s%> He commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and it stood <S%H5975><s%> fast.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> nullifies <S%H6565><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the nations; <S%H1471><s%> He frustrates <S%H5106><s%> the plans <S%H4284><s%> of the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>

The counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> stands <S%H5975><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> The plans <S%H4284><s%> of His heart <S%H3820><s%> from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation. <S%H1755><s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the nation <S%H1471><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> The people <S%H5971><s%> whom He has chosen <S%H977><s%> for His own inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> looks <S%H5027><s%> from heaven; <S%H8064><s%> He sees <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men; <S%H120><s%>
From His dwelling <S%H3427><s%> place <S%H4349><s%> He looks <S%H7688><s%> out On all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%>
He who fashions <S%H3335><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of them all, <S%H3162><s%> He who understands <S%H995><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their works. <S%H4639><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> is not saved <S%H3467><s%> by a mighty <S%H7230><s%> army; <S%H2428><s%> A warrior <S%H1368><s%> is not delivered <S%H5337><s%> by great <S%H7230><s%> strength. <S%H3581><s%>
A horse <S%H5483><s%> is a false <S%H8267><s%> hope <S%H8267><s%> for victory; <S%H8668><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> does it deliver <S%H4422><s%> anyone by its great <S%H7230><s%> strength. <S%H2428><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the eye <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is on those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Him, On those who hope <S%H3176><s%> for His lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%>
To deliver <S%H5337><s%> their soul <S%H5315><s%> from death, <S%H4194><s%> And to keep <S%H2421><s%> them alive <S%H2421><s%> in famine. <S%H7458><s%>
Our soul <S%H5315><s%> waits <S%H2442><s%> for the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> He is our help <S%H5828><s%> and our shield. <S%H4043><s%>
For our heart <S%H3820><s%> rejoices <S%H8055><s%> in Him, Because <S%H3588><s%> we trust <S%H982><s%> in His holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%>
Let Thy lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> be upon us, According as we have hoped <S%H3176><s%> in Thee.
